TopicTitle: Black arrow files, for anyone who wants to fix/ update it for new version

Articles.Content:
I don't play KSP anymore but I am still pretty proud of this mod I almost finished, and a guy by the name of spannermonkey asked me for these files and seemingly finished it, but AFAIK never released it

here is what he made

http://i.imgur.com/LnLaTJa.png

and heres the files I originally had, which don't have the stage inside the fairings and the fairings are see through on inside

http://www./download/458gs3i5hpw03dv/BlkArrow.rar

I can't remember whats wrong with it or what needs done it's been so long but just read the thread in my sig
